attributes.action: Virgin Trains to take over London Midland on the West Coast Main Line Through Northampton
attributes.additional_details:
London Midland are a Shambles! Always delays, Dirty carriages, Cramed Carriages, We deserve a decent service! So I would to Propose Virgin Trains to take over the West Coast Main Line through Northampton From London Midland.

Stops including;
Birmingham New Street
Stechford
Lea Hall
Marston Green
Birmingham International
Berkswell
Hampton In Arden
Tile Hill
Canley
Coventry
Rugby
Long Buckby
Northampton
Wolverton
Milton Keynes Central
Bletchley
Leighton Buzzard
Hempel Hempstead
Bushy
Tring
Watford Junction
And London Euston
